mapper.select: select mr.RESOURCECODE,ACT_CODE from SYS_RO_MODULERES MR LEFT JOIN SYS_RO_RESACT RA ON RA.RESUU_ID = MR.ID where mr.resurl = '/dictType/toListDictType.do' AND MR.STATUS=1 AND MR.NEEDRIGHT=1

select DISTINCT ACT_CODE from SYS_RO_PERSONROLE A left join SYS_RO_ROLERIGHT B on A.role_id=B.ROLEID left join SYS_RO_MODULERES MR ON B.RESUUID = MR.ID LEFT JOIN SYS_RO_RESACT RA ON RA.RESUU_ID = B.RESUUID AND INSTR(B.ACTCODES,RA.ACT_CODE)>0 where A.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and B.id is not null and mr.resurl = #{resurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MR.STATUS=1 AND MR.NEEDRIGHT=1

SELECT DISTINCT LINKURL FROM ( SELECT NAVURL AS LINKURL FROM sys_ro_module WHERE ENABLED='1' AND NEED_RIGHT='1' UNION SELECT RESURL AS LINKURL FROM sys_ro_moduleres WHERE STATUS='1' AND NEEDRIGHT='1' UNION SELECT ACT_URL AS LINKURL FROM sys_ro_resact WHERE STATES='1' AND NEED_RIGHT='1' ) R WHERE LINKURL IS NOT NULL

select mr.RESOURCECODE,ACT_CODE from SYS_RO_MODULERES MR LEFT JOIN SYS_RO_RESACT RA ON RA.RESUU_ID = MR.ID where ( mr.resurl = #{reqUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or ra.act_url=#{reqUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND MR.STATUS=1 AND MR.NEEDRIGHT=1

select mr.RESOURCECODE,ACT_CODE from sys_ro_roleright rr left join SYS_RO_PERSONROLE ur on rr.roleid = ur.role_id left join sys_ro_moduleres mr on mr.id = rr.resuuid left join sys_ro_resact ra on ra.resuu_id = rr.resuuid and INSTR(rr.ACTCODES,ra.ACT_CODE)>0 where ur.USER_ID =#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (mr.resurl=#{reqUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or ra.act_url=#{reqUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND MR.STATUS=1 AND MR.NEEDRIGHT=1
